pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Shiny Presentation for Working with Multinomial Logistic Regression // An interactive presentation on the topic of Multinomial Logistic Regression. It is helpful to those who want to learn Multinomial Logistic Regression quickly and get a hands on experience. The presentation has a template for solving problems on Multinomial Logistic Regression. Runtime examples are provided in the package function as well as at https://jarvisatharva.shinyapps.io/MultinomPresentation.
